ISSUE.TITLE: Docker 1.4 requires `--force` when using existing tag
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: See https://github.com/docker/docker/pull/8511. When the Docker image is built it's tagged with the first tag (https://github.com/drone/drone/blob/fb254e3f2c675ed65b78551224e3ed1115739f5c/plugin/publish/docker.go#L92), then later all tags are applied (https://github.com/drone/drone/blob/fb254e3f2c675ed65b78551224e3ed1115739f5c/plugin/publish/docker.go#L102). This should either use `--force` for all tags, or not retag the first one.
